title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.21 - Decisions and orders; costs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 670.21 - Decisions and orders; costs

State Regulations
(a) An order or judgment of this court
determining a cause or an order of this court determining a motion shall be
drafted by the court and shall be entered in the office of the clerk of this
court. Such an order or judgment shall be deemed entered on the date upon which
it was issued. (b) Costs and disbursements upon any cause or motion shall be allowed only as
directed by the court. In the absence of a contrary direction, the award by
this court of costs upon any cause shall be deemed to include
disbursements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
670.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
